item.title: Videographer for Dental Video Ads Miami - Upwork
item.description:
**MIAMI/ SOUTH FL VIDEOGRAPHERS ONLY** Include your work! I am looking for a videographer in the south Florida, Miami area to film video ads for a dental office. Project will be 2-4 hours. INCLUDE YOUR WORK!!

Hourly Range: $100.00-$115.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 21:04 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production
Skills: Videography, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Voice Over Talent for 3 Minute Healthcare Video - Upwork
item.description:
We need a voice over recorded for a healthcare vision video. There are 514 words. Past video had less words and was 2 min and 30 seconds. I anticipate the length to be 3 to 3.5 minutes of voice over recorded in an upbeat, friendly, trustworthy female voice.

Hourly Range: $50.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 20:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:US English Dialect, Middle-Aged Adult, Voice-Over, Female, Voice Acting
Skills: US English Dialect, Middle-Aged Adult, Voice-Over, Female, Voice Acting
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
